## TOnPlotDetached type

Listener for plot detaching from chart.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TOnPlotDetached<TRenderer extends TUnknownRenderer> = TListener<"onPlotDetached", TOnPlotDetachedArgs<TRenderer>>;
```
